archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1162
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a foundation partner, I want to become a primary account holder for a kids plan account so that I can give a kids plan to disadvantaged youth

properties.value: PIM: what the role of the foundation partner? how account holder account relates to a kids plan account - is it same customer? Foundation partner can be modelled just as a business customer who would be the owner of many plans under different accounts

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
